justification: Shows awareness of B’s style and preferences but misreads B’s needs: Team B already has multiple viable RBs (Tier 1/2 committees), so RB scarcity is overstated. Emphasizing playoff schedule for a 4-4 team needing immediate points is misaligned. Calling Trevor Martin a ‘more stable’ WR conflicts with his deep-threat variance. Trade is feasible but value framing and acceptance probability seem optimistic given Robinson’s Tier 5 status.
